bioconda.name: ntedit
bioconda.summary: Ultrafast, lightweight, scalable genome assembly polishing, and SNV detection & annotation

biocontainers.name: ntedit
biocontainers.summary: ultra fast, scalable genome assembly polishing and snv detection

biotools.summary: Scalable genomics application for polishing genome assembly drafts. It simplifies polishing and "haploidization" of gene and genome sequences with its re-usable Bloom filter design.

bioschemas.name: ntEdit
bioschemas.summary: Scalable genomics application for polishing genome assembly drafts. It simplifies polishing and "haploidization" of gene and genome sequences with its re-usable Bloom filter design.
